name: Ninda Fight
description:
BEAT EM UP

created for the  itch.io SPAIN GAME JAM in seven days

controls: (KEYBOARD / MOUSE)

  • WASD = move,  
  • ESPACE= jump, 
  • MOUSE 1 = attack, 
  • MOUSE 2 = dash,

controls: (GAMEPAD)

  • LEFT STICK = move,
  • A BUTTON = jump,
  • X BUTTON = attack,
  • TRIGGERS = dash,

Developed by:

  • Igor Calleja (ikhamon) - youtube channel
  • Zohiartze Fernandez (Kailarx)
